content:
@Fran√ßois G. Dorais has been patiently trying to upstream List.finRange to Batteries in batteries#1055 (and previous PRs linked from there!) but ran into a wall because of Mathlib.

I hope that this PR will get him unstuck.

However, currently on the branch there is a working-but-horrible-hack of a proof in Mathlib/NumberTheory/Modular.lean. Would any of the authors of that file @Heather Macbeth, @Marc Masdeu, @Alex Kontorovich be available to look at the proof (marked "FIXME") and get it straight again?
I more or less fixed the terrible proof now, so false alarm for those pinged above.
There are still some proofs that seemingly have to change, but only in the form of changing the simp only contents. I hope these are okay?
Ah! Changing the new definition to List.ofFn (fun x => x) gives slightly nicer terms than List.ofFn id, so I have switched to that, and will see if that lets us undo the changes to proofs.
